sentences.en: Astute salesmen know how to invest emotionally.
sentences.cn: 精明的商人懂得如何感情投资.

sentences.en: Business is booming and foreigners are scrambling to invest.
sentences.cn: 商业繁荣，外国人争相投资。

sentences.en: I have decided to invest in a new car.
sentences.cn: 我已经决定买一辆新汽车.

sentences.en: I’ve got a few thousand dollars I’m looking to invest.
sentences.cn: 我有几千美元想作投资。

sentences.en: Invest-ment is becoming a chancy business.
sentences.cn: 投资正变成一项风险事业。

sentences.en: It pays to invest in protective clothing.
sentences.cn: 在防护服上投资是值得的。

sentences.en: It was very difficult to leave a home we had invested so much in.
sentences.cn: 那个家我们投入得太多，要离开真的很难。

sentences.en: It would be imprudent to invest all your money in one company.
sentences.cn: 把所有的钱都投资在一家公司是不明智的。

sentences.en: Now is a good time to invest in the property market.
sentences.cn: 现在是对房地产市场投资的好时机。

sentences.en: She wanted to set up her own company to invest in films.
sentences.cn: 她想成立自己的公司投资电影。

sentences.en: The best time to invest is now.
sentences.cn: 现在是投资的最佳时机.

sentences.en: They are unwilling to invest any more money in the project.
sentences.cn: 他们不想在这个项目上再增加投资。

sentences.en: They intended to invest hugely in new technology.
sentences.cn: 他们打算在新技术方面投入大量资金。

sentences.en: They offer every inducement to foreign businesses to invest in their states.
sentences.cn: 他们为外国企业提供种种优厚条件，以吸引这些企业到他们所在的州投资。

sentences.en: They would have to offer cast-iron guarantees to invest in long-term projects.
sentences.cn: 他们需提供绝对可靠的担保，才能投资长期项目。

sentences.en: To get the most out of your money, you have to invest.
sentences.cn: 要想把钱的收益最大化，就必须投资。

sentences.en: We can invest your money tax - free abroad.
sentences.cn: 我们可以将你的钱 免税 投资到国外.

words.tran_cn: 授职仪式；授权仪式；装饰或覆盖物

phrases.tran_cn: v. 投资于；[口]买进；寄希望于

trans.tran_cn: 投资，投入（时间/精力等），授予
trans.tran_en: to buy shares, property, or goods because you hope that the value will increase and you can make a profit

trans.tran_cn: 投资； 投入； 授予， 赋予
trans.tran_en: to buy shares, property, or goods because you hope that the value will increase and you can make a profit
